titles.title: Child RESCUE Act
Child RESCUE Act
National Response to Exploitation and Sexual Abuse of Children in UnÂ­adÂ­dressed Emergencies Act

To direct the Attorney General to convene a national working group to study proactive strategies and needed resources for the rescue of children from sexual exploitation and abuse, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
National Response to Exploitation and Sexual Abuse of Children in Unaddressed Emergencies Act or the Child RESCUE Act
This bill establishes a temporary working group to report on issues involving child sexual abuse and child sexual abuse materials.
